item.title: About
item.description: I’m too nerdy for the rockstart, too rock n’ roll for the nerds. I’m an open minded person who tries to challenge the status quo by questioning the obvious things. The WHY drives my curiosity. In computer science I’ve found my passion and was matter of time until I discovered the underground. I’ve worked as a programmer for Artificial intelligence companies, as a Security analyst for tradi banks and as a Red teammer for a defense contractor.
